General.Name: Ningxia Zhongyin Cashmere Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningxia Zhongyin Cashmere Co., Ltd. purchases, produces, trades in, sells, and exports cashmere and related products in China. The company engages in investment and asset management business. It is also involved in the production and sale of new energy lithium battery cathode materials; processing of the graphitization business, including negative electrode materials; lithium batteries application activities; and the specialty graphite business. In addition, the company engages in the contract energy management; software development; and battery leasing activities; and offers information consulting services, as well as energy-saving management services. It also exports its products to Europe, the United States, and Japan. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Yinchuan, China. Ningxia Zhongyin Cashmere Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Hengtian Jinshi Investment Management Co., Ltd.
General.Address: Lingwu Ecological Textile Park, Lingwu, China
